paragraphs.text: ü©∏Fleurü©∏

Being a king comes with many responsibilities, a lot of pressure and expectations‚Ä¶Before settling and starting his own family with the Queen, Zeon found himself in a moment of weakness when visiting Ora-Tel‚ÄôTeuvel. Zeon spent a night with a beautiful elven woman named Aela, who‚Äôd laid eyes on him when he arrived in the city. It was this evening during the blood moon that Fleur was conceived.

Zeon had left not long after this night, and it took a few months before Aela realised she was with child. Her dad being on the high council, she knew he wouldn‚Äôt have approved of her affair and as rumours spread around the city, it wouldn‚Äôt be long before he‚Äôd find out, so late one night, she left the safe surroundings of Ora-Tel‚ÄôTeuvel and wandered from town to town for a while. It turned out that not everyone was a big fan of elven folk, so she started wearing a cloak with a hood to hide the ears; it felt safer in her condition. When she got close to the due date, she ended up in Aramore, just outside Sol-Visloya.  She got a room at ‚ÄúAll the Way Inn‚Äù which is Aramore‚Äôs local inn.

She soon gave birth to Fleur, a little baby girl. She picked up a few jobs here and there to get a little bit of money, but the jobs never lasted long or paid well. When Fleur was about six years they spent most days hungry, though, in good spirits and love, Aela got desperate and decided that perhaps the king could help out the little family financially, she‚Äôd never told Fleur about who her dad was. She had told Fleur to stay inside and wait for her return while she went out for some work, she left what little dried meat they had left and some berries she‚Äôd picked from a nearby forest and took off to seek out the king.

Aela never returned and after a few days at the Inn Fleur was out of food and the Inn keep had kicked her out since she couldn‚Äôt pay for the room. Hungry she did something she knew she shouldn't but had no other options. Tempted by the sweet smell of pies, she‚Äôd found herself in the shop ‚ÄúHigh Tide Pie‚Äù, she grabbed one while she thought no one was looking, ran out and sat in the sally behind the shop, eating the pie quick enough to give anyone a stomach ache. The older lady running the shop grabbed her by the arm out of nowhere, Fleur didn‚Äôt even hear her coming and asked where her parents were. Fleur explained she had no dad and that her mom left for work days ago but hasn‚Äôt returned. The old lady pitied the little half-elf and introduced herself as Nana. Nana told Fleur to stay with her until her mom returned, the streets were unsafe for a little girl like her.

Days turned to months, months turned to years, and Fleur became the daughter Nana never got herself. Nana used to be known as ‚ÄúThe Striking Arrow‚Äù she was some kind of hero in her earlier days, if she hadn‚Äôt sustained a bad leg injury, she might still be out there. No one really knows she got her injury, she‚Äôs a proud woman and as far as the world knows, she just decided to settle for a calmer life running a pie shop. She never really told Fleur about her past life, afraid she‚Äôd miss it too much however, she did teach Fleur about archery, about the ways of the blood archer, which she picked up very quickly. Fleur and Nana would practise in the courtyard up through her teens and young adulthood.

One day when Fleur and Nana were out, they found a beat-up young man. Nana the kindhearted woman she was, decided to take him home, she made up a bed in the coroner of the basement. The shop building was in three floors, the ground floor was the shop, 1st floor was Fleur and Nana's apartment and the basement was for shop stock, kitchen and tools.

For a year, Noah would be part of the little shop family, Nana would send him out on errands and get him to carry the heavy loads while Fleur worked the front desk, selling pies and helping Nana bake them. Nana would sometimes get Noah involved with baking as well if they got bigger orders from the Inn or parties. Noah and Nana would often argue over petty things, it was like watching a mom and son argue. Fleur would stay out of it, but after arguments, she‚Äôd remind Nana that she didn‚Äôt really hate him and that he did so much around the shop, his arrival had been good for Nana, she didn‚Äôt tell anyone, but her leg was getting worse with the years, Fleur could see it but knew better than to confront Nana about it.

Some nights Fleur would be the one to pick Noah up from the local Inn and various bars, drunk and sometimes beaten up. She‚Äôd see to his wounds and try to convince him not to drink too much and try to stay away from fighting, knowing he‚Äôd not listen. In the mornings, he‚Äôd be up late and get lectured by Nana, then they‚Äôd argue, and the circle of life continued from there.

After a year of Noah being with them, they received two letters. It was Fleur that was in the shop that day, and the letters were for Noah and ‚ÄúThe Striking Arrow‚Äù. Fleur opened the letter to ‚ÄúThe Striking Arrow‚Äù, and she quickly realised that there was more to Nana than what the eye could see, besides, from all the training they‚Äôd done, it looked like Nana had been using those skills before becoming a baker. After reading the letter, she felt a knot in her stomach, Nana couldn‚Äôt go‚Ä¶ Not in her condition, but she‚Äôd be too proud to stay back‚Ä¶ Fleur hid her letter and gave Noahs his. Early next morning, she‚Äôd packed her things before Nana got up, and left Nana a note about the letter and that she loved her very much, before leaving with Noah for the job.
TLDR
Fleur was a product of an affair her mom Aela had with king Zeon
Aela‚Äôs dad is on the high council in Ora-Tel‚ÄôTeuvel
Aela left before rumours about her pregnancy spread to her dad
Aela gave birth to Fleur in Aramore, where she worked small jobs for 6 years, never really making enough to sustain the family
Aela lefter to talk to the king about financial support but never returned
Fleur was left to fend for herself and stole from the pie shop owned by Nana
Nana took Fleur in and raised her as her own from the age of six
Nana was known as ‚ÄúThe striking arrow‚Äù in her younger days, she was a hero, but retired in secret due to a bad leg
Nana taught Fleur about Archery and Blood Archery throughout Fleur's teens and young adulthood
Nana and Fleur found Noah in bad condition and took him in. Noah developed a mother-son relationship with Nana and they‚Äôd argue a lot
Noah would do a lot of the heavy lifting for Nana who‚Äôs leg was getting worse, though she never told anyone, Fleur would notice
Fleur would get Noah home when he‚Äôd been out drinking or been in fights
About a year after Noah‚Äôs arrival Nana and Noah receive summons for the job, however without Nana knowing, Fleur reads her letter and decides to take her place, knowing it would kill Nana to go.
Knives
Fleur has a grandad on the high council in Ora-Tel‚ÄôTeuvel who may or may not know about her existence
Her mom never returned from seeking out the king, is she dead, lost or gone?
She‚Äôs the bastard of king Zeon, does he know he has a bastard kid? Maybe, maybe not.
She‚Äôs grown a strong relationship with Nana and see‚Äôs her as a second mother
She‚Äôs taken Nanas place without her permission
Nana
Personal Notes
I‚Äôve only ever known this life and sharing it with you and Nana has made that pretty special.
You can‚Äôt bake a pie without breaking a few eggs
Noah

She‚Äôs known Noah for a year. She knows he has a habit of getting into petty arguments with Nanna. He drinks a lot and gets into fights with others. He seems lazy at first glance, he‚Äôll whine through his tasks but he‚Äôll get them done. He‚Äôs a good guy. He‚Äôs scruffy. He is also afraid of ghosts.
She‚Äôs grown very fond of him and cares deeply for him.
Campfire stories
Here I have collected a handful of stories about Fleur‚Äôs past, some including Noah, that can be used for downtime chit-chat.
Finding Noah

It was in the fall and fairly cold outside. Nana and I had gone to the nearby forest to try to find the seasonal mushrooms and gather some firewood. He was just lying there, first we thought he was dead because there were leaves on him and he was cold, but he was breathing. We got him onto our little carriage dragged by Peanut and took him home. Nana made up a bed in the basement for him. I wasn‚Äôt allowed down there for a few days while he was recovering, Nana said she wanted to ensure he wasn‚Äôt bad.
He decided to stick around, why, I‚Äôm not sure but‚Ä¶ I‚Äôm happy he did and so is Nana, even though she won‚Äôt admit it.
Noah‚Äôs tavern adventure

I learned quickly that Noah knows what he likes, which often brought him to the tavern. Nana hated it, she‚Äôs always said, ‚ÄúIf you‚Äôre drunk, you‚Äôll act like a punk‚Äù. It was only a month or two after we found Noah he spent an evening at the local tavern, in the middle of the night, the tavern keeper and his son knocked on the door and woke up Nana, they dropped off Noah and Nana was livid! We got him to bed, but oh boy, did she yell at him in the morning, whatever hungover he would have had, she made it worse for sure.

After that day, I‚Äôd made a deal with the tavern-keepers son that whenever Noah needed to be picked up, he‚Äôd come throw small stones or things alike at my window to not wake up Nana, I‚Äôd look out and if he had one hand up, it‚Äôd be able to get him home with an arm over the shoulder, if he held up two arms I‚Äôd have to get Peanut and the carriage.
In exchange for the tavernkeeper‚Äôs son‚Äôs help, I‚Äôd bake him sweet pies, cherries, strawberries, anything sweet.
Letters to Nana
During their travels and adventuring, Fleur will be writing home to Nana. Her letter will be collected here and can be found on her in case she dies.
The Apology
Dear Nana,

I‚Äôm terribly sorry I left. I cannot put into words my love for you and how much I appreciate everything you have done for me. Please allow me to do this for you. You have always raised me to be honest with you, and for the first time, I wasn't.

Remember the letter Noah got from Miss Lady Gimzara? You see, you received one as well, but I couldn‚Äôt let you go, I know you put on a strong face, but I‚Äôve seen you in the evening, and I‚Äôve seen the pain in your eyes, I know about your bad leg and I have for a very long time.

I‚Äôve never been able to pay you back for all the years you gave me, fed me, housed me, and taught me to protect myself. But let me do this for you, let me take your place and help people, the way you‚Äôve helped people in town.

We also can‚Äôt let Noah go on his own, he just found a safe place to rest and relax‚Ä¶ I can‚Äôt let him get into trouble now, we can‚Äôt let him end up unconscious in a forest, hungry and weak. I know you love him too Nana, even though you don‚Äôt show him.
I love you, please forgive me.
Fleur.
The first kill
Dear Nana,
I hope you‚Äôre doing well and have hired someone to help out in the pie shop. I will send some money soon I promise.
We arrived at the Lady Gimzaras manor, she instructed us to retrieve an item that had been stolen. After a small investigation, we figured out who I was and set out to find him.
We did find him not far from the city and he had friends, but it ended in a fight.

We always practised blood magic, I never really understood how strong it was until now. I killed two people Nana.. I never thought I‚Äôd have to. I feel horrible, I don‚Äôt feel like their life was mine to take. I don‚Äôt know what to do to get rid of the guilt. Maybe if I remember them, then they won‚Äôt really die till I do. Please Nana what would you do?
It looked so easy for Noah, I think he has killed people before Nana, did you know? Did he ever tell you?
I will write to you again soon, we‚Äôre soon leaving to return Gimzaras Item. I‚Äôll look at the stars tonight and think of you.
Fleur.
The Kidnapping
Dear Nana,

Mom used to say no one is born evil, that every new soul brought to earth is kind and good. I guess I‚Äôve been naive‚Ä¶ It made me believe that inside everyone there's something good, that no one is evil, just people having a bad day.

Do you remember what you used to tell me? That there's less distance between the earth and the moon than between good people on earth. I always saw the good in people Nana, living with you sheltered me from bad people, but I‚Äôm starting to understand what you said.

I do believe there are a lot of good people in the world, but I didn‚Äôt think people could be as bad as some of the people I have met. A demon kidnapped me, I was put under her little spell, I‚Äôve been poisoned, I‚Äôve been burned and almost killed when we tried to stop her from hurting anyone else, but do you know what the scariest part of everything was? When trapped in her house for god knows how long, I was afraid Noah wouldn‚Äôt come looking for me, I was afraid I‚Äôd never see him again, I was afraid I was never going to see you again. I wasn‚Äôt afraid of dying, I was just afraid of being left behind.

Noah did find me Nana, he and the others found me. Noah fought the demon too, he tried to talk to her about what she did and I think he believed there was more to her than just being a bad person, it reminded me of Mom.

After everything we went to the castle with the prince, he wasn‚Äôt very happy about us killing the demon, we didn‚Äôt have a choice though. The king was nice, he knows Mom, but he doesn‚Äôt know where she is. We also met Alistair, he seems really nice too‚Ä¶ He said I looked familiar, perhaps he knows Mom too.
I miss you Nana.
Fleur
New Feelings
Dear Nana,
Today we started our mission, given to us by the King, to retrieve the aasimar child. It was all going well until we encountered these giant monsters in the forest during our travel.

It was a tough battle, and Noah went down. I luckily had a healing potion I‚Äôd saved in case something like this happened. But Nana, he went down again, and I had no more potions, I tried my best to stop the bleeding, but he was slipping through my fingers, I tried my best, but I wasn‚Äôt good enough.

I thought I had lost him, I thought he was gone. I felt this darkness inside me, this hole, this endless hole that didn‚Äôt feel like it could ever be filled again. I felt sad, but in a way that made me think I‚Äôd never be able to feel happiness again. I‚Äôve never felt like this before Nana.

Alistair saved him, he is okay, he could do what I couldn‚Äôt. But my feelings are changing from lost to angry, angry at myself, angry at how he just doesn‚Äôt seem to care about how close to death he was. I‚Äôm scared of these feelings and I‚Äôm afraid what they do to me. I don‚Äôt know what I would do without him Nana.

Why haven‚Äôt you prepared me for what the real world is like? How horrible it feels to kill other people, how lonely it feels when you‚Äôre separated from your friends, afraid it might be forever, all because some person thinks they can just kidnap you.

How broken and hurt you can feel when you think you‚Äôve lost someone you keep very close to your heart. All these horrible feelings Nana, why have you never told me about them? keeping me inside! I was not prepared for this, how am I supposed to handle this?
Maybe it was good I left. Maybe it‚Äôs best I don‚Äôt come back.
Fleur
Lost
Dear Nana,

There's a fight coming up that I‚Äôm worried about. We‚Äôre trapped inside this small village, we were sent out to get this kid Luna for the king and we found her, but she‚Äôs been stuck here in the village.
I just wanted to say‚Ä¶ despite everything, I appreciate that you‚Äôve looked after me for a long time. If I die I just wanted to say thank you.
Fleur
Getting Use To It
Dear Nana,
I was afraid that
He said he was sorry and he didn‚Äôt push me away
He said he was a soldier
He got attacked by a woman
We‚Äôre in Lavayus now
Love
Dear friend,

It‚Äôs said that death is a woman with cold blue eyes, you knew her because she‚Äôd dogged you at every footstep. Why? Maybe you thought you were meant to end up alone? Maybe she wanted you, a fighter who needed no one, to finally be afraid, when the truth is you‚Äôd always been afraid.
You now know what it means to need‚Ä¶ To love, to lose it all
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PSTdh_iACw4
Session 1
McScribles Tome of Adventures - All the adventures in the world, starting with the shining five, written by Nibbles T. McScribles.
Lady Genzarah of Sol-Visloya was the one who sent the letters of summon.
First meeting with the Lady Genzarah, someone has stolen some valuables from her and she wants them back. That‚Äôs where we come in.

They are going to be staying at the Staut brewery - The Innkeeper is a redhead with a massive scar on her face and a blind eye, her sister is also at the Inn her name is Krystal and seems to have men falling around her. She charmed Andel.
End of session summary

Fleur and Noah arrived together in Sol-Visloya. They arrived at Lady Genzarah‚Äôs mansion, where they met the rest of the part, a hobgoblin named Misha, a human woman named Lanora and an elven man named Andel. Here they proceeded to open the gates to the estate by holding out the invitation the lady had sent.

Fleur was nervous, it was the first time she‚Äôs ever left her home town of Aramore. She‚Äôs not an adventure, let alone a hero‚Ä¶ But she took Nanas place, knowing she would have gone to help out anyone in need‚Ä¶ because that is what real heroes do, even as she retired, Nana had continued to be a pillar in their home towns community, so afraid she‚Äôd risk her health and leave, Fleur took her place without telling her. Now that she found herself around heroes, the nerves started to creep up on her.

As they entered the manor and were let to the lady‚Äôs dining room, she‚Äôd really start to feel uncomfortable. She barely listened in to the conversation, though she did manage to pick up, that the lady wanted them to retrieve a valuable artefact for the lady, that thieves had stolen. Her worst nightmare came to life when lady Genzarah pointed out Fleur had been quiet the whole time, Fleur was stunned and just managed to come up with the sentence, ‚ÄúWe‚Äôll, of course, help you my‚Äô lady‚Äù which was not really a great response to the lady‚Äôs observation. Lady Genzarah proceeded to mention she was very impressed with the tales of her heroism stretching over 50 years though she looked so young, Fleur was about to explode thinking everyone would know she wasn‚Äôt supposed to be here, but the lady Genzarah excused it with ‚ÄúI can understand that you‚Ä¶ elven folk mature differently, you must share your beauty routine with me, to look so young for so long‚Äù the others however didn‚Äôt seem to bat an eye, but it was starting to become all too much for her.

She didn‚Äôt eat when the food came out and felt slightly more relieved when the lady left the room. She shortly came to herself when Lanora started asking Noah about him being a dog and Noah started explaining why he‚Äôd probably have dog traits, he‚Äôs a good guy and Fleur didn‚Äôt like him comparing himself to a dog, he was good of heart and much bigger person than anyone she knew, despite perhaps not coming off as such at first glance.

As they retreated to the local Inn and get their keys, she just managed to get into her room, before throwing up all the repressed feelings and whatever was in her stomach, she felt more at peace away from the manor.

When she got downstairs she found Andel absolutely infatuated with a lady with red hair, very beautiful. After casting Detect Magic she saw that he was under some kind of charm spell of hers, in an attempt to help him, she tried to spill a drink on her, but it turned into an awkward situation instead and she made a fool of herself.
Session 2
At the warehouse - papers with the name Peter Ashglade on it
It seemed like the thieves knew where the item they wanted was and went straight for it, seemingly without trouble
Orian and someone called Peter Ashglade was working the night of the incident, Peter was assaulted during the incident but survived
Peter lives in Shady Hills

The party went to the docks to investigate Lady Genzarah‚Äôs warehouse from where the item had been stolen. After a long time of questioning the warehouse worker Oron, they find out that he was there the night of the incident with a guy called Peter Ashglade. Misha also finds some paper with text in the direction of ‚ÄúI‚Äôll let you in when you arrive - PA‚Äù.

The party then sets off to find Peter in Shady Hills, where he resides. We enter a tavern local to Lanora and ask around for where he lives and find a housemate of his drunk in the tavern. Eventually, he leads os back to their house, and we find another note in their house to Peter from someone telling him to go to a red tree, which is about a day's travel from the city.

The party then goes to Lady Genzhara's estate to ask for horses to help them catch up to. Initially, Andel is not very convincing when trying to convince Andres to give them horses. Still, Fleur steps up and basically threatens him, saying ‚ÄúIf we can‚Äôt catch up to them, we will have to tell the Lady Genzarah that we couldn‚Äôt catch up to them because you wouldn‚Äôt aid us‚Äù. The party was allowed to borrow the lady‚Äôs two horses.

They set off after Peter and after hours of riding, they decide to settle down for a few hours of rest, both for the party and the horses. When they wake up and start riding again, they see smoke from not too far away. Lenora and Andel set off to scout out the location to see what's going on. They find a handful of bandits and get caught up in a fight with them.
After a long time, the rest of the party decides to go look for them, and we find ourselves in combat.
Session 3
Literally just combat.
The party found themselves in a fight against the thief Peter of Lady Gimzaras item. They fought them and won, Fleur made her first two kills, which she didn‚Äôt feel good about.
Killscore: 2
Thoughts for next session (4):
Did fighting the bandits look too easy for Noah? Has he hurt people before?
Heavy guilt for killing the two bandits, will draw their faces in her notebook to remember them, so they won‚Äôt die before she does (spiritually speaking), maybe talk with Noah about it?
Session 4
Returned the item to Lady Gimzara
Lady Gimzara took a special interest in Misha after she told the lady about her ability to talk to the dead and her knowledge of necromancy.

Contracts - While representing lady, be on best behaviour, don‚Äôt embarrass her, fulfil every mission to the best of ability, wear apparel for her house, get a place of living, you cannot own other properties while working for her, keep treasure providing it doesn‚Äôt have her seal on it, not allowed to seek outside work from other houses/companies. Can take tasks from mission boards, but don‚Äôt wear Gimzara apparel. If the contract is broken, she‚Äôll have to teach a Gimzara handyman Blood magic and lose a memory.
Kalinga Feydream is the mother of the sisters Kalista and Krystal Feydream. Their mother could read minds, and their dad built the tavern, he was a craftsman
It was a man who hurt Kalista, because she didn‚Äôt give him the attention that he wanted
The sisters are not really sisters, Krystal is feeding on Kalista
Krystal kidnapped Fleur
Session 5
Everyone went shopping excel Fleur who had been kidnapped
Andel also went to the library to try find out more about what creature Krystal is. Whatever we thought she was, was just wrong
Noah got a new weapon
The team decided to take a long rest before starting to look for Fleur
Fleur spends time with Krystal who asks a lot of questions about the rest of the group despite them only knowing each other for like‚Ä¶ 24 hours
Thoughts for next session (6):
She‚Äôs been alone with Krystal for long enough now, that Fleur could become anxious about perhaps Noah would just have cut ties and have left her like her mom did.
When they find her, maybe she‚Äôll hug him and say ‚ÄúI started to worry you wouldn‚Äôt come back for me‚Äù
Session 6
The others find Fleur at Kalist and Krystals house, which was literally 5 min away
Fleur can‚Äôt leave because there's a magic spell now that hurts you if you leave the house
Noah goes in and tries to take her out which results in Fleur taking damage
They all decide to enter to try help Fleur
House is full of traps and we are having to look for them all the time
We end up in the basement which is a huge cave and now we need to try find her
Session 7
They met a boy who was looking for a neckless Krystal took
They slayed Krystal
Krystal called Kalista a Dreamwalker
Killscore: 3
Thoughts for next session (8):
Noah kept questioning Krystal about her actions like he could somewhat relate to what might have happened to her. If he‚Äôs sad about it all came down to her being killed:

Fleur would touch him comforting (hand around shoulder/on shoulder or hand) and say ‚ÄúYou can‚Äôt save someone who does not want to be saved, no matter how much you might feel like you need to‚Äù - ‚Äú We can‚Äôt win all battlers, not matter how hard we fight‚Äù
Session 8
We find a journal from someone in Kalista family
We find some loot, and Fleur finds a new bow with scales on it
They get taken to the king, who thanks them for their work
King asks them to go retrieve a child from a nearby city an Aasamar with black skin and white markings, Luna
We meet Zeilith and Diana who joins the team
King Zeon reveals that he knows Fleaurs mother but doesn‚Äôt know where she is
Alistair said he thought Fleur looks familiar, so he probably knows her mom too
Session 9
Some of the party went shopping for magic items
Fleur drew the men she killed in her notebook
The party started travelling to save the aasamar child, which was going to take 8-10 days
At a stop, Lanora and Fleur pranked Noah
They started fighting some big crickets
Session 10
Fighting the crickets
Noah goes down and Fleur uses her Superiors healing potions on him and he gets up
Noah takes more damage and almost dies, Fleur tries to stabilize him but fails and this awoke new feelings, fears.. She‚Äôs never felt before.
Alistair comes to the rescue and heals him, saving him from death

The party had come upon the hoard of oversized crickets, which they were trying to take down. It was all going well, Alistair was saying things like, ‚ÄúLet me show you youngins how it‚Äôs done‚Äù, and then he missed both his attacks, saying he was getting ‚Äútoo old‚Äù. Lanora was there, though and kept up the spirit!

The crickets were a lot stronger than we thought they would be. However, a tiny 2ft leaf person with a nut-head came to our aid. Unfortunately, Noah went down, lucky Fleur had saved the superior health potion they got from the king, which she poured into his mouth and he was back up. Quickly after, though, he took another round of damage and went down, Fleur had no more health potions left, her medicine skills weren't good enough, and it looked like Noah was dead. Thank god Alistair managed to get him back to life (Noah not happy that he was saved first by Fleur and then Alistair :‚ÄôD), but Fleur is not taking the whole thing very well.
Zeilith was having a rough time during the battle, she was unlucky with her spells and
It looked like she felt helpless, it was too dangerous for her to move, and it seemed like no matter what she tried, it wasn‚Äôt working, she seemed defeated

When the battle ended, everyone was thankfully still alive. The party took a short rest at what looked like once was a camp, but over time had become the home for these big crickets. Lanora and Zelith went through the tents and items left behind. They found a larger sum of money and a handful of special items, Lanora also found a letter that only she read and didn‚Äôt share the information with us. (Kody took her to another channel and read it for her, so we don‚Äôt know what kind of saucy letter it was)

Willow the new guy spends the short rest painting the party (stick figure drawing in the general chat), Lanora, Alistair and Noah spend it relaxing, and Zelith looked into the new magic items with help from Fleur, who had mostly just spent time writing in her notebook by herself.

The party then set off again to continue their travels. Fleur took to steering the cart and handling the horses. In the back of the cart, Lanora brought up a name for the team that she'd thought of ‚ÄúDawn's Providence‚Äù which sparked a conversation between her, Noah, Willow and Diana about faith and gods.

They ended up stopping after a few hours and setting up camp, taking turns to stay awake. Willow and Zeilith first, then Fleur, Then Noah and to mess with Miguel, Kody said Alistair would take the 3rd shift with Noah, then Lanora last. The first two shifts go by without trouble, then Alistair and Noah chat about what happened today and Alistair tried to share some wise words with Noah.

When they wake up Lanora, Noah asks her for help with Fleur and what to do, she says (bless her, literally the sweetest woman, I swear) that she‚Äôd try to help, but she‚Äôs also not willing to break any trust she has with Fleur herself, should Fleur want to talk with her.

During Lanoras watch, theres this creepy dude who approaches the camp, Lanora uses mage hand to wake us all up as she goes to speak with him. He asks to sit down at the fire for a while, bur he refuses to show his face, so she asks him to keep walking, which he does. From what she could see, he was very pale and odd looking, he could have been undead, but we‚Äôre not sure. The party went back to sleep, except Lanora of cause and nothing happened after that. By morning the session ended.
Session 11
Goes through magic forest with loads of zombies
Noah disappeared and Fleur for a little was afraid she‚Äôd lost him again
Session 12
Bad hooded guy turns up, same one as the fella who visited us during our campfire
Barricade the city
Session 13
Luna got kidnapped after we spend a whole session barricading the city‚Ä¶
We go after her and find bad boy and his bigger boy who has Luna inside him
Alistair remove Luna and gets blown up as we make out escape with her
We get teleported to Noah‚Äôs city out of nowhere
We don‚Äôt want to go to the city because they don‚Äôt like weird looking people and decides to go to Lanoras city which then happens to be 35 days of travel away
We‚Äôre then forced to go to the city
Session 14

raw_text:
ü©∏Fleurü©∏

Being a king comes with many responsibilities, a lot of pressure and expectations‚Ä¶Before settling and starting his own family with the Queen, Zeon found himself in a moment of weakness when visiting Ora-Tel‚ÄôTeuvel. Zeon spent a night with a beautiful elven woman named Aela, who‚Äôd laid eyes on him when he arrived in the city. It was this evening during the blood moon that Fleur was conceived.

Zeon had left not long after this night, and it took a few months before Aela realised she was with child. Her dad being on the high council, she knew he wouldn‚Äôt have approved of her affair and as rumours spread around the city, it wouldn‚Äôt be long before he‚Äôd find out, so late one night, she left the safe surroundings of Ora-Tel‚ÄôTeuvel and wandered from town to town for a while. It turned out that not everyone was a big fan of elven folk, so she started wearing a cloak with a hood to hide the ears; it felt safer in her condition. When she got close to the due date, she ended up in Aramore, just outside Sol-Visloya.  She got a room at ‚ÄúAll the Way Inn‚Äù which is Aramore‚Äôs local inn.

She soon gave birth to Fleur, a little baby girl. She picked up a few jobs here and there to get a little bit of money, but the jobs never lasted long or paid well. When Fleur was about six years they spent most days hungry, though, in good spirits and love, Aela got desperate and decided that perhaps the king could help out the little family financially, she‚Äôd never told Fleur about who her dad was. She had told Fleur to stay inside and wait for her return while she went out for some work, she left what little dried meat they had left and some berries she‚Äôd picked from a nearby forest and took off to seek out the king.

Aela never returned and after a few days at the Inn Fleur was out of food and the Inn keep had kicked her out since she couldn‚Äôt pay for the room. Hungry she did something she knew she shouldn't but had no other options. Tempted by the sweet smell of pies, she‚Äôd found herself in the shop ‚ÄúHigh Tide Pie‚Äù, she grabbed one while she thought no one was looking, ran out and sat in the sally behind the shop, eating the pie quick enough to give anyone a stomach ache. The older lady running the shop grabbed her by the arm out of nowhere, Fleur didn‚Äôt even hear her coming and asked where her parents were. Fleur explained she had no dad and that her mom left for work days ago but hasn‚Äôt returned. The old lady pitied the little half-elf and introduced herself as Nana. Nana told Fleur to stay with her until her mom returned, the streets were unsafe for a little girl like her.

Days turned to months, months turned to years, and Fleur became the daughter Nana never got herself. Nana used to be known as ‚ÄúThe Striking Arrow‚Äù she was some kind of hero in her earlier days, if she hadn‚Äôt sustained a bad leg injury, she might still be out there. No one really knows she got her injury, she‚Äôs a proud woman and as far as the world knows, she just decided to settle for a calmer life running a pie shop. She never really told Fleur about her past life, afraid she‚Äôd miss it too much however, she did teach Fleur about archery, about the ways of the blood archer, which she picked up very quickly. Fleur and Nana would practise in the courtyard up through her teens and young adulthood.

One day when Fleur and Nana were out, they found a beat-up young man. Nana the kindhearted woman she was, decided to take him home, she made up a bed in the coroner of the basement. The shop building was in three floors, the ground floor was the shop, 1st floor was Fleur and Nana's apartment and the basement was for shop stock, kitchen and tools.

For a year, Noah would be part of the little shop family, Nana would send him out on errands and get him to carry the heavy loads while Fleur worked the front desk, selling pies and helping Nana bake them. Nana would sometimes get Noah involved with baking as well if they got bigger orders from the Inn or parties. Noah and Nana would often argue over petty things, it was like watching a mom and son argue. Fleur would stay out of it, but after arguments, she‚Äôd remind Nana that she didn‚Äôt really hate him and that he did so much around the shop, his arrival had been good for Nana, she didn‚Äôt tell anyone, but her leg was getting worse with the years, Fleur could see it but knew better than to confront Nana about it.

Some nights Fleur would be the one to pick Noah up from the local Inn and various bars, drunk and sometimes beaten up. She‚Äôd see to his wounds and try to convince him not to drink too much and try to stay away from fighting, knowing he‚Äôd not listen. In the mornings, he‚Äôd be up late and get lectured by Nana, then they‚Äôd argue, and the circle of life continued from there.

After a year of Noah being with them, they received two letters. It was Fleur that was in the shop that day, and the letters were for Noah and ‚ÄúThe Striking Arrow‚Äù. Fleur opened the letter to ‚ÄúThe Striking Arrow‚Äù, and she quickly realised that there was more to Nana than what the eye could see, besides, from all the training they‚Äôd done, it looked like Nana had been using those skills before becoming a baker. After reading the letter, she felt a knot in her stomach, Nana couldn‚Äôt go‚Ä¶ Not in her condition, but she‚Äôd be too proud to stay back‚Ä¶ Fleur hid her letter and gave Noahs his. Early next morning, she‚Äôd packed her things before Nana got up, and left Nana a note about the letter and that she loved her very much, before leaving with Noah for the job.

TLDR

Fleur was a product of an affair her mom Aela had with king Zeon

Aela‚Äôs dad is on the high council in Ora-Tel‚ÄôTeuvel

Aela left before rumours about her pregnancy spread to her dad

Aela gave birth to Fleur in Aramore, where she worked small jobs for 6 years, never really making enough to sustain the family

Aela lefter to talk to the king about financial support but never returned

Fleur was left to fend for herself and stole from the pie shop owned by Nana

Nana took Fleur in and raised her as her own from the age of six

Nana was known as ‚ÄúThe striking arrow‚Äù in her younger days, she was a hero, but retired in secret due to a bad leg

Nana taught Fleur about Archery and Blood Archery throughout Fleur's teens and young adulthood

Nana and Fleur found Noah in bad condition and took him in. Noah developed a mother-son relationship with Nana and they‚Äôd argue a lot

Noah would do a lot of the heavy lifting for Nana who‚Äôs leg was getting worse, though she never told anyone, Fleur would notice

Fleur would get Noah home when he‚Äôd been out drinking or been in fights

About a year after Noah‚Äôs arrival Nana and Noah receive summons for the job, however without Nana knowing, Fleur reads her letter and decides to take her place, knowing it would kill Nana to go.

Knives

Fleur has a grandad on the high council in Ora-Tel‚ÄôTeuvel who may or may not know about her existence

Her mom never returned from seeking out the king, is she dead, lost or gone?

She‚Äôs the bastard of king Zeon, does he know he has a bastard kid? Maybe, maybe not.

She‚Äôs grown a strong relationship with Nana and see‚Äôs her as a second mother

She‚Äôs taken Nanas place without her permission

Nana

Personal Notes

I‚Äôve only ever known this life and sharing it with you and Nana has made that pretty special.

You can‚Äôt bake a pie without breaking a few eggs

Noah

She‚Äôs known Noah for a year. She knows he has a habit of getting into petty arguments with Nanna. He drinks a lot and gets into fights with others. He seems lazy at first glance, he‚Äôll whine through his tasks but he‚Äôll get them done. He‚Äôs a good guy. He‚Äôs scruffy. He is also afraid of ghosts.

She‚Äôs grown very fond of him and cares deeply for him.

Campfire stories

Here I have collected a handful of stories about Fleur‚Äôs past, some including Noah, that can be used for downtime chit-chat.

Finding Noah

It was in the fall and fairly cold outside. Nana and I had gone to the nearby forest to try to find the seasonal mushrooms and gather some firewood. He was just lying there, first we thought he was dead because there were leaves on him and he was cold, but he was breathing. We got him onto our little carriage dragged by Peanut and took him home. Nana made up a bed in the basement for him. I wasn‚Äôt allowed down there for a few days while he was recovering, Nana said she wanted to ensure he wasn‚Äôt bad.

He decided to stick around, why, I‚Äôm not sure but‚Ä¶ I‚Äôm happy he did and so is Nana, even though she won‚Äôt admit it.

Noah‚Äôs tavern adventure

I learned quickly that Noah knows what he likes, which often brought him to the tavern. Nana hated it, she‚Äôs always said, ‚ÄúIf you‚Äôre drunk, you‚Äôll act like a punk‚Äù. It was only a month or two after we found Noah he spent an evening at the local tavern, in the middle of the night, the tavern keeper and his son knocked on the door and woke up Nana, they dropped off Noah and Nana was livid! We got him to bed, but oh boy, did she yell at him in the morning, whatever hungover he would have had, she made it worse for sure.

After that day, I‚Äôd made a deal with the tavern-keepers son that whenever Noah needed to be picked up, he‚Äôd come throw small stones or things alike at my window to not wake up Nana, I‚Äôd look out and if he had one hand up, it‚Äôd be able to get him home with an arm over the shoulder, if he held up two arms I‚Äôd have to get Peanut and the carriage.

In exchange for the tavernkeeper‚Äôs son‚Äôs help, I‚Äôd bake him sweet pies, cherries, strawberries, anything sweet.

Letters to Nana

During their travels and adventuring, Fleur will be writing home to Nana. Her letter will be collected here and can be found on her in case she dies.

The Apology

Dear Nana,

I‚Äôm terribly sorry I left. I cannot put into words my love for you and how much I appreciate everything you have done for me. Please allow me to do this for you. You have always raised me to be honest with you, and for the first time, I wasn't.

Remember the letter Noah got from Miss Lady Gimzara? You see, you received one as well, but I couldn‚Äôt let you go, I know you put on a strong face, but I‚Äôve seen you in the evening, and I‚Äôve seen the pain in your eyes, I know about your bad leg and I have for a very long time.

I‚Äôve never been able to pay you back for all the years you gave me, fed me, housed me, and taught me to protect myself. But let me do this for you, let me take your place and help people, the way you‚Äôve helped people in town.

We also can‚Äôt let Noah go on his own, he just found a safe place to rest and relax‚Ä¶ I can‚Äôt let him get into trouble now, we can‚Äôt let him end up unconscious in a forest, hungry and weak. I know you love him too Nana, even though you don‚Äôt show him.

I love you, please forgive me.

Fleur.

The first kill

Dear Nana,

I hope you‚Äôre doing well and have hired someone to help out in the pie shop. I will send some money soon I promise.

We arrived at the Lady Gimzaras manor, she instructed us to retrieve an item that had been stolen. After a small investigation, we figured out who I was and set out to find him.

We did find him not far from the city and he had friends, but it ended in a fight.

We always practised blood magic, I never really understood how strong it was until now. I killed two people Nana.. I never thought I‚Äôd have to. I feel horrible, I don‚Äôt feel like their life was mine to take. I don‚Äôt know what to do to get rid of the guilt. Maybe if I remember them, then they won‚Äôt really die till I do. Please Nana what would you do?

It looked so easy for Noah, I think he has killed people before Nana, did you know? Did he ever tell you?

I will write to you again soon, we‚Äôre soon leaving to return Gimzaras Item. I‚Äôll look at the stars tonight and think of you.

Fleur.

The Kidnapping

Dear Nana,

Mom used to say no one is born evil, that every new soul brought to earth is kind and good. I guess I‚Äôve been naive‚Ä¶ It made me believe that inside everyone there's something good, that no one is evil, just people having a bad day.

Do you remember what you used to tell me? That there's less distance between the earth and the moon than between good people on earth. I always saw the good in people Nana, living with you sheltered me from bad people, but I‚Äôm starting to understand what you said.

I do believe there are a lot of good people in the world, but I didn‚Äôt think people could be as bad as some of the people I have met. A demon kidnapped me, I was put under her little spell, I‚Äôve been poisoned, I‚Äôve been burned and almost killed when we tried to stop her from hurting anyone else, but do you know what the scariest part of everything was? When trapped in her house for god knows how long, I was afraid Noah wouldn‚Äôt come looking for me, I was afraid I‚Äôd never see him again, I was afraid I was never going to see you again. I wasn‚Äôt afraid of dying, I was just afraid of being left behind.

Noah did find me Nana, he and the others found me. Noah fought the demon too, he tried to talk to her about what she did and I think he believed there was more to her than just being a bad person, it reminded me of Mom.

After everything we went to the castle with the prince, he wasn‚Äôt very happy about us killing the demon, we didn‚Äôt have a choice though. The king was nice, he knows Mom, but he doesn‚Äôt know where she is. We also met Alistair, he seems really nice too‚Ä¶ He said I looked familiar, perhaps he knows Mom too.

I miss you Nana.

Fleur

New Feelings

Dear Nana,

Today we started our mission, given to us by the King, to retrieve the aasimar child. It was all going well until we encountered these giant monsters in the forest during our travel.

It was a tough battle, and Noah went down. I luckily had a healing potion I‚Äôd saved in case something like this happened. But Nana, he went down again, and I had no more potions, I tried my best to stop the bleeding, but he was slipping through my fingers, I tried my best, but I wasn‚Äôt good enough.

I thought I had lost him, I thought he was gone. I felt this darkness inside me, this hole, this endless hole that didn‚Äôt feel like it could ever be filled again. I felt sad, but in a way that made me think I‚Äôd never be able to feel happiness again. I‚Äôve never felt like this before Nana.

Alistair saved him, he is okay, he could do what I couldn‚Äôt. But my feelings are changing from lost to angry, angry at myself, angry at how he just doesn‚Äôt seem to care about how close to death he was. I‚Äôm scared of these feelings and I‚Äôm afraid what they do to me. I don‚Äôt know what I would do without him Nana.

Why haven‚Äôt you prepared me for what the real world is like? How horrible it feels to kill other people, how lonely it feels when you‚Äôre separated from your friends, afraid it might be forever, all because some person thinks they can just kidnap you.

How broken and hurt you can feel when you think you‚Äôve lost someone you keep very close to your heart. All these horrible feelings Nana, why have you never told me about them? keeping me inside! I was not prepared for this, how am I supposed to handle this?

Maybe it was good I left. Maybe it‚Äôs best I don‚Äôt come back.

Fleur

Lost

Dear Nana,

There's a fight coming up that I‚Äôm worried about. We‚Äôre trapped inside this small village, we were sent out to get this kid Luna for the king and we found her, but she‚Äôs been stuck here in the village.

I just wanted to say‚Ä¶ despite everything, I appreciate that you‚Äôve looked after me for a long time. If I die I just wanted to say thank you.

Fleur

Getting Use To It

Dear Nana,

I was afraid that

He said he was sorry and he didn‚Äôt push me away

He said he was a soldier

He got attacked by a woman

We‚Äôre in Lavayus now

Love

Dear friend,

It‚Äôs said that death is a woman with cold blue eyes, you knew her because she‚Äôd dogged you at every footstep. Why? Maybe you thought you were meant to end up alone? Maybe she wanted you, a fighter who needed no one, to finally be afraid, when the truth is you‚Äôd always been afraid.

You now know what it means to need‚Ä¶ To love, to lose it all

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PSTdh_iACw4

Session 1

McScribles Tome of Adventures - All the adventures in the world, starting with the shining five, written by Nibbles T. McScribles.

Lady Genzarah of Sol-Visloya was the one who sent the letters of summon.

First meeting with the Lady Genzarah, someone has stolen some valuables from her and she wants them back. That‚Äôs where we come in.

They are going to be staying at the Staut brewery - The Innkeeper is a redhead with a massive scar on her face and a blind eye, her sister is also at the Inn her name is Krystal and seems to have men falling around her. She charmed Andel.

End of session summary

Fleur and Noah arrived together in Sol-Visloya. They arrived at Lady Genzarah‚Äôs mansion, where they met the rest of the part, a hobgoblin named Misha, a human woman named Lanora and an elven man named Andel. Here they proceeded to open the gates to the estate by holding out the invitation the lady had sent.

Fleur was nervous, it was the first time she‚Äôs ever left her home town of Aramore. She‚Äôs not an adventure, let alone a hero‚Ä¶ But she took Nanas place, knowing she would have gone to help out anyone in need‚Ä¶ because that is what real heroes do, even as she retired, Nana had continued to be a pillar in their home towns community, so afraid she‚Äôd risk her health and leave, Fleur took her place without telling her. Now that she found herself around heroes, the nerves started to creep up on her.

As they entered the manor and were let to the lady‚Äôs dining room, she‚Äôd really start to feel uncomfortable. She barely listened in to the conversation, though she did manage to pick up, that the lady wanted them to retrieve a valuable artefact for the lady, that thieves had stolen. Her worst nightmare came to life when lady Genzarah pointed out Fleur had been quiet the whole time, Fleur was stunned and just managed to come up with the sentence, ‚ÄúWe‚Äôll, of course, help you my‚Äô lady‚Äù which was not really a great response to the lady‚Äôs observation. Lady Genzarah proceeded to mention she was very impressed with the tales of her heroism stretching over 50 years though she looked so young, Fleur was about to explode thinking everyone would know she wasn‚Äôt supposed to be here, but the lady Genzarah excused it with ‚ÄúI can understand that you‚Ä¶ elven folk mature differently, you must share your beauty routine with me, to look so young for so long‚Äù the others however didn‚Äôt seem to bat an eye, but it was starting to become all too much for her.

She didn‚Äôt eat when the food came out and felt slightly more relieved when the lady left the room. She shortly came to herself when Lanora started asking Noah about him being a dog and Noah started explaining why he‚Äôd probably have dog traits, he‚Äôs a good guy and Fleur didn‚Äôt like him comparing himself to a dog, he was good of heart and much bigger person than anyone she knew, despite perhaps not coming off as such at first glance.

As they retreated to the local Inn and get their keys, she just managed to get into her room, before throwing up all the repressed feelings and whatever was in her stomach, she felt more at peace away from the manor.

When she got downstairs she found Andel absolutely infatuated with a lady with red hair, very beautiful. After casting Detect Magic she saw that he was under some kind of charm spell of hers, in an attempt to help him, she tried to spill a drink on her, but it turned into an awkward situation instead and she made a fool of herself.

Session 2

At the warehouse - papers with the name Peter Ashglade on it

It seemed like the thieves knew where the item they wanted was and went straight for it, seemingly without trouble

Orian and someone called Peter Ashglade was working the night of the incident, Peter was assaulted during the incident but survived

Peter lives in Shady Hills

The party went to the docks to investigate Lady Genzarah‚Äôs warehouse from where the item had been stolen. After a long time of questioning the warehouse worker Oron, they find out that he was there the night of the incident with a guy called Peter Ashglade. Misha also finds some paper with text in the direction of ‚ÄúI‚Äôll let you in when you arrive - PA‚Äù.

The party then sets off to find Peter in Shady Hills, where he resides. We enter a tavern local to Lanora and ask around for where he lives and find a housemate of his drunk in the tavern. Eventually, he leads os back to their house, and we find another note in their house to Peter from someone telling him to go to a red tree, which is about a day's travel from the city.

The party then goes to Lady Genzhara's estate to ask for horses to help them catch up to. Initially, Andel is not very convincing when trying to convince Andres to give them horses. Still, Fleur steps up and basically threatens him, saying ‚ÄúIf we can‚Äôt catch up to them, we will have to tell the Lady Genzarah that we couldn‚Äôt catch up to them because you wouldn‚Äôt aid us‚Äù. The party was allowed to borrow the lady‚Äôs two horses.

They set off after Peter and after hours of riding, they decide to settle down for a few hours of rest, both for the party and the horses. When they wake up and start riding again, they see smoke from not too far away. Lenora and Andel set off to scout out the location to see what's going on. They find a handful of bandits and get caught up in a fight with them.

After a long time, the rest of the party decides to go look for them, and we find ourselves in combat.

Session 3

Literally just combat.

The party found themselves in a fight against the thief Peter of Lady Gimzaras item. They fought them and won, Fleur made her first two kills, which she didn‚Äôt feel good about.

Killscore: 2

Thoughts for next session (4):

Did fighting the bandits look too easy for Noah? Has he hurt people before?

Heavy guilt for killing the two bandits, will draw their faces in her notebook to remember them, so they won‚Äôt die before she does (spiritually speaking), maybe talk with Noah about it?

Session 4

Returned the item to Lady Gimzara

Lady Gimzara took a special interest in Misha after she told the lady about her ability to talk to the dead and her knowledge of necromancy.

Contracts - While representing lady, be on best behaviour, don‚Äôt embarrass her, fulfil every mission to the best of ability, wear apparel for her house, get a place of living, you cannot own other properties while working for her, keep treasure providing it doesn‚Äôt have her seal on it, not allowed to seek outside work from other houses/companies. Can take tasks from mission boards, but don‚Äôt wear Gimzara apparel. If the contract is broken, she‚Äôll have to teach a Gimzara handyman Blood magic and lose a memory.

Kalinga Feydream is the mother of the sisters Kalista and Krystal Feydream. Their mother could read minds, and their dad built the tavern, he was a craftsman

It was a man who hurt Kalista, because she didn‚Äôt give him the attention that he wanted

The sisters are not really sisters, Krystal is feeding on Kalista

Krystal kidnapped Fleur

Session 5

Everyone went shopping excel Fleur who had been kidnapped

Andel also went to the library to try find out more about what creature Krystal is. Whatever we thought she was, was just wrong

Noah got a new weapon

The team decided to take a long rest before starting to look for Fleur

Fleur spends time with Krystal who asks a lot of questions about the rest of the group despite them only knowing each other for like‚Ä¶ 24 hours

Thoughts for next session (6):

She‚Äôs been alone with Krystal for long enough now, that Fleur could become anxious about perhaps Noah would just have cut ties and have left her like her mom did.

When they find her, maybe she‚Äôll hug him and say ‚ÄúI started to worry you wouldn‚Äôt come back for me‚Äù

Session 6

The others find Fleur at Kalist and Krystals house, which was literally 5 min away

Fleur can‚Äôt leave because there's a magic spell now that hurts you if you leave the house

Noah goes in and tries to take her out which results in Fleur taking damage

They all decide to enter to try help Fleur

House is full of traps and we are having to look for them all the time

We end up in the basement which is a huge cave and now we need to try find her

Session 7

They met a boy who was looking for a neckless Krystal took

They slayed Krystal

Krystal called Kalista a Dreamwalker

Killscore: 3

Thoughts for next session (8):

Noah kept questioning Krystal about her actions like he could somewhat relate to what might have happened to her. If he‚Äôs sad about it all came down to her being killed:

Fleur would touch him comforting (hand around shoulder/on shoulder or hand) and say ‚ÄúYou can‚Äôt save someone who does not want to be saved, no matter how much you might feel like you need to‚Äù - ‚Äú We can‚Äôt win all battlers, not matter how hard we fight‚Äù

Session 8

We find a journal from someone in Kalista family

We find some loot, and Fleur finds a new bow with scales on it

They get taken to the king, who thanks them for their work

King asks them to go retrieve a child from a nearby city an Aasamar with black skin and white markings, Luna

We meet Zeilith and Diana who joins the team

King Zeon reveals that he knows Fleaurs mother but doesn‚Äôt know where she is

Alistair said he thought Fleur looks familiar, so he probably knows her mom too

Session 9

Some of the party went shopping for magic items

Fleur drew the men she killed in her notebook

The party started travelling to save the aasamar child, which was going to take 8-10 days

At a stop, Lanora and Fleur pranked Noah

They started fighting some big crickets

Session 10

Fighting the crickets

Noah goes down and Fleur uses her Superiors healing potions on him and he gets up

Noah takes more damage and almost dies, Fleur tries to stabilize him but fails and this awoke new feelings, fears.. She‚Äôs never felt before.

Alistair comes to the rescue and heals him, saving him from death

The party had come upon the hoard of oversized crickets, which they were trying to take down. It was all going well, Alistair was saying things like, ‚ÄúLet me show you youngins how it‚Äôs done‚Äù, and then he missed both his attacks, saying he was getting ‚Äútoo old‚Äù. Lanora was there, though and kept up the spirit!

The crickets were a lot stronger than we thought they would be. However, a tiny 2ft leaf person with a nut-head came to our aid. Unfortunately, Noah went down, lucky Fleur had saved the superior health potion they got from the king, which she poured into his mouth and he was back up. Quickly after, though, he took another round of damage and went down, Fleur had no more health potions left, her medicine skills weren't good enough, and it looked like Noah was dead. Thank god Alistair managed to get him back to life (Noah not happy that he was saved first by Fleur and then Alistair :‚ÄôD), but Fleur is not taking the whole thing very well.

Zeilith was having a rough time during the battle, she was unlucky with her spells and

It looked like she felt helpless, it was too dangerous for her to move, and it seemed like no matter what she tried, it wasn‚Äôt working, she seemed defeated

When the battle ended, everyone was thankfully still alive. The party took a short rest at what looked like once was a camp, but over time had become the home for these big crickets. Lanora and Zelith went through the tents and items left behind. They found a larger sum of money and a handful of special items, Lanora also found a letter that only she read and didn‚Äôt share the information with us. (Kody took her to another channel and read it for her, so we don‚Äôt know what kind of saucy letter it was)

Willow the new guy spends the short rest painting the party (stick figure drawing in the general chat), Lanora, Alistair and Noah spend it relaxing, and Zelith looked into the new magic items with help from Fleur, who had mostly just spent time writing in her notebook by herself.

The party then set off again to continue their travels. Fleur took to steering the cart and handling the horses. In the back of the cart, Lanora brought up a name for the team that she'd thought of ‚ÄúDawn's Providence‚Äù which sparked a conversation between her, Noah, Willow and Diana about faith and gods.

They ended up stopping after a few hours and setting up camp, taking turns to stay awake. Willow and Zeilith first, then Fleur, Then Noah and to mess with Miguel, Kody said Alistair would take the 3rd shift with Noah, then Lanora last.
